verses.verse: And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon his father <S%H1><s%>'s face <S%H6440><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%> upon him <S%H5401><s%>, and kissed him.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> the physicians <S%H7495><s%> to embalm <S%H2590><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>: and the physicians <S%H7495><s%> embalmed <S%H2590><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> were fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> for him <S%H4390><s%>; for so are fulfilled the days <S%H3117><s%> of those which are embalmed <S%H2590><s%>: and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> mourned <S%H1058><s%> for him sixty and ten <S%H7657><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And when the days <S%H3117><s%> of his mourning <S%H1068><s%> were past <S%H5674><s%>, Joseph <S%H3130><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, If now I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your eyes <S%H5869><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%>, I pray you <S%H241><s%>, in the ears of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

My father <S%H1><s%> made me swear <S%H7650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, behold <S%H2009><s%>, I die <S%H4191><s%>: in my grave <S%H6913><s%> which I have dug <S%H3738><s%> for me in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, there shall you bury me <S%H6912><s%>. Now therefore let me go up <S%H5927><s%>, I pray you and bury <S%H6912><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and I will come again <S%H7725><s%>.
And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Go up <S%H5927><s%>, and bury <S%H6912><s%> your father <S%H1><s%>, according as he made you swear <S%H7650><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to bury <S%H6912><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>: and with him went up <S%H5927><s%> all the servants <S%H5650><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>, and all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>,

And all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and his brothers <S%H251><s%>, and his father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>: only their little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and their flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and their herds <S%H1241><s%>, they left <S%H5800><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>.
And there went up <S%H5927><s%> with him both chariots <S%H7393><s%> and horsemen <S%H6571><s%>: and it was a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H3515><s%> company <S%H4264><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%> to the threshingfloor <S%H1637><s%> of Atad <S%H329><s%>, which is beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, and there they mourned <S%H5594><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> and very <S%H3966><s%> severe <S%H3515><s%> lamentation <S%H4553><s%>: and he made <S%H6213><s%> a mourning <S%H60><s%> for his father <S%H1><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And when the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, saw <S%H7200><s%> the mourning <S%H60><s%> in the floor <S%H1637><s%> of Atad <S%H329><s%>, they said <S%H559><s%>, This is a severe <S%H3515><s%> mourning <S%H60><s%> to the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>: therefore the name of it <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Abel <S%H67><s%>â€“mizraim, which is beyond <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.
And his sons <S%H1121><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto him according as he commanded them <S%H6680><s%>:

For his sons <S%H1121><s%> carried <S%H5375><s%> him into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the cave <S%H4631><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> of Machpelah <S%H4375><s%>, which Abraham <S%H85><s%> bought <S%H7069><s%> with the field <S%H7704><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%> of a buryingplace <S%H6913><s%> of Ephron <S%H6085><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> Mamre <S%H4471><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, he <S%H251><s%>, and his brothers, and all that went up <S%H5927><s%> with him to bury <S%H6912><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> he had buried <S%H6912><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>.

And when Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s brothers <S%H251><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that their father <S%H1><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%>, they said <S%H559><s%>, Joseph <S%H3130><s%> will probably <S%H3863><s%> hate us <S%H7852><s%>, and will certainly <S%H7725><s%> pay <S%H7725><s%> us all the evil <S%H7451><s%> which we did unto him <S%H1580><s%>.

And they sent a messenger <S%H6680><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, your father <S%H1><s%> did command <S%H6680><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> he died <S%H4194><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

So shall you say <S%H559><s%> unto Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, Forgive <S%H5375><s%>, I pray you <S%H577><s%> now <S%H6588><s%>, the trespass of your brothers <S%H251><s%>, and their sin <S%H2403><s%>; for they did <S%H1580><s%> unto you evil <S%H7451><s%>: and now <S%H5375><s%>, we pray you forgive the trespass <S%H6588><s%> of the servants <S%H5650><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>. And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> when they spoke unto him <S%H1696><s%>.
And his brothers <S%H251><s%> also went <S%H3212><s%> and fell down <S%H5307><s%> before his face <S%H6440><s%>; and they said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H5650><s%>, we be your servants.
And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3372><s%>, Fear not <S%H430><s%>: for am I in the place of God?

But as for you <S%H2803><s%>, you thought evil <S%H7451><s%> against me <S%H430><s%>; but God meant it <S%H2803><s%> unto good <S%H2896><s%>, to <S%H4616><s%> bring to pass <S%H6213><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>, to save <S%H2421><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%>.

Now therefore fear <S%H3372><s%> you not <S%H3557><s%>: I will nourish you <S%H2945><s%>, and your little ones. And he comforted <S%H5162><s%> them <S%H1696><s%>, and spoke kindly unto them <S%H3820><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, he <S%H1><s%>, and his father's house <S%H1004><s%>: and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> of the third <S%H8029><s%> generation <S%H1121><s%>: the sons also of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> were brought up <S%H3205><s%> upon Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s knees <S%H1290><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto his brothers <S%H251><s%>, I die <S%H4191><s%>: and God <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H6485><s%> visit <S%H6485><s%> you <S%H5927><s%>, and bring you out of this land <S%H776><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> which he swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham <S%H85><s%>, to Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and to Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> took a oath <S%H7650><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H6485><s%> visit <S%H6485><s%> you <S%H5927><s%>, and you shall carry up my bones <S%H6106><s%> from here <S%H2088><s%>.

So Joseph <S%H3130><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, being a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>: and they embalmed <S%H2590><s%> him <S%H3455><s%>, and he was put in a coffin <S%H727><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
